Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $29.95 - $21.48
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:00:46 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Game Story

Let the furious fun begin! Players sprint to arrange a set of 5 blocks so that they match a pattern shown on a card. First player to succeed grabs the card and a new matching race starts. Tensions rise as you scramble to outpace and outsmart your opponents in this ingenious game of perception. So fire-up your neurons and be transported by Match Madness!!

How To Play Match Madness

1. Take a set of five blocks.

2. Flip a pattern card.

3. The first player to recreate the pattern wins!

About Us

FoxMind manufactures and distributes toys and games that offer mind stimulating fun and help develop reasoning skills.

We strive to be known as ‘the Smarter Fun company’ that brings family and friends together for memorable times.

FAST-PACED AND ACTION-PACKED: Players race to solve the puzzle on the card by flipping, rotating and combining identical sets of 5 patterned blocks. Sharp eyes, fast hands and quick minds prevail in this fun-filled pattern-matching frenzy!
PATTERN RECOGNITION AND DEXTERITY: Develop rapid problem-solving abilities and fine motor skills. Match Madness encourages players to think critically, experiment and develop new strategies in order solve the puzzles more quickly.
TWO GAME MODES FOR HIGHER REPLAYABILITY: Choose between Quick-Play (speed) and Total Madness (highest score wins).
AWARD-WINNING FAMILY GAME: Winner of the 2018 Imagination Gaming Family Gold Award and Problem-Solving Gold Award.
SUITABLE FOR AGES 7 AND UP: Can be played in groups of up to 4 players. Match Madness can also be played solo: solve the puzzles at your own pace or try to beat your best times.

Read more

The rules are simple, just use the rubber band to bounce the chess you own through the goal to reach ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $16.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:29:18 UTC – Details)



MEDIUM SIZE SET: Fast sling puck game is a game that both children and adults can play. Medium size table game toy is more for children over 6 years old. The rules are simple, just use the rubber band to bounce the chess you own through the goal to reach the opponent’s area, and you are the winner if you hit all the chess pieces first. (SIZE: 14*9*1.2 in)
DEVELOP CHILDREN’S ABILITIES: Sling puck game is a fast-paced game. It can improve children’s concentration, hand-eye coordination and rapid response ability in fast and concentrated hits, and can keep children away from video games temporarily. This slingshot game toy can also enhance a child’s sense of competition.
HIGH QUALITY SOLID WOODEN: Wooden hockey table game toy use high-quality solid wood frames to make chess pieces and chessboards, which are durable and smooth. The surface is smooth and will not hurt the player’s hands. It can also make the chess pieces slide more smoothly. The chessboard adopts professional tenon and tenon structure can make it stronger.
FAMILY FUN OR PARTY GAME: As a desktop battle board game toy pursuing speed, it is suitable for colleague dinners, friends gathering, family entertainment, can promote colleague relations, enhance parent-child interaction which is an active atmosphere toy. Let us enjoy a relaxing leisure time with family and friends!
IDEAL GIFT FOR KIDS & ADULTS: Wooden sling hockey board game is a toy for all ages. Table game toy is made of wood, adhering to the concept of environmental protection and recyclability, without batteries. It can be used as a child’s birthday gift or as a holiday gift. Package includes: 1 chess board, 10 chess pieces, Christmas special edition box!

Samsung Galaxy A22 5G mobile was launched on 2nd June 2021. The phone comes with a 6.60-inch touchscreen display. Samsung Galaxy A22 5G is powered by an octa-core processor. It comes with 4GB of RAM. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G runs Android 11 and is powered by a 5000mAh battery. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G supports proprietary fast charging. As far as the cameras are concerned, the Samsung Galaxy A22 5G on the rear packs a triple camera setup featuring a 48-megapixel primary camera with an f/1.8 aperture; a 5-megapixel camera with an f/2.2 aperture; a 2-megapixel camera, and a 2-megapixel camera with an f/2.4 aperture. The rear camera setup has autofocus. It has a single front camera setup for selfies, featuring an 8-megapixel sensor with an f/2.0 aperture. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G runs One UI Core 3.1 is based on Android 11 and packs 64GB of inbuilt storage (up to 1000GB). The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G is a dual-SIM (GSM) mobile that accepts Nano-SIM mobile. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G measures 167.20 x 76.40 x 9.00mm (height x width x thickness) and weighs 203.00 grams. It was launched in Grey, Mint, and Violet color. Connectivity options on the Samsung Galaxy A22 5G include Wi-Fi, GPS, USB Type-C, 3G, and 4G (with support for Band 40 used by some LTE networks in India). Sensors on the phone include accelerometer, ambient light sensor, proximity sensor, and fingerprint sensor.
128GB ROM, 4GB RAM, Expandable MicroSD, MediaTek MT6833 Dimensity 700 5G (7 nm), Octa-core, Mali-G57 MC2
Dual-SIM (GSM) mobile that accepts Nano-SIM mobile. Rear Camera: 48MP, F1.8 + 5MP, F2.2 + 2MP, F2.4 (depth), Front Camera: 8MP, F2.0
2G Bands: 850, 900, 1800, 1900MHz, 3G Bands: 850, 900, 1700, 1900, 4G LTE Bands: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 12, 17, 20, 26, 28, 38, 40, 41 , 66
5G Bands: N1(2100), N3(1800), N5(850), N7(2600), N8(900), N20(800), N28(700), N66(AWS-3) N38(2600), N40(2300), N41(2500), N78(3500). May not get 5G as it is not available in all regions. Please check with your carrier for compatible 5G Bands.
International Model compatible with Most GSM Carriers in US and Global like T-Mobile, AT&T, MetroPCS, etc. Will NOT work with CDMA Carriers Such as Verizon, Sprint.

More display means more room to play: Expand your view to the 6.5-inch Infinity-V Display of Galaxy A12 Nacho and see what you’ve been missing. Thanks to HD+ technology, your everyday content looks sharp, crisp and clear. Upgrade your mobile photography with Quad Camera: Snap memorable moments in clear detail with the 48MP Main Camera. Expand the viewing angle with Ultra Wide Camera. Customize focus with Depth Camera, or get closer to the details with Macro Camera. Power that keeps you going: Stay ahead of the day with a battery that won’t slow you down. The 5,000mAh (typical) battery lets you keep doing what you do, for hours on end. And with up to 15W of Adaptive Fast Charging, Galaxy A12 Nacho quickly gets back to full power. Give yourself more room to play: Galaxy A12 Nacho combines Octa-core processing power with up to 4GB of RAM for fast and efficient performance for the task at hand. Enjoy 128GB of internal storage.
128GB ROM, 4GB RAM, Exynos 850 (8nm), Octa-core (4×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55 & 4×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55), Mali-G52, Android 11, One UI 3.1

From the brand

Games the Family Will Love

At Brybelly we love games, and we love to share games. Build better family game nights with beloved classics and fun new titles.

Shop Favorites & New Launches

How did we get our start?

In 2005 Brybelly was founded like all great companies: in a garage. What began as selling poker chips at flea markets has become a medium-sized Indiana business employing nearly 50 hoosiers.

What makes our products unique?

A Brybelly game tries to pack in extra value. If there’s a similar product, we want to include more stuff. If it’s a familiar game, we want to add fun extra rules for more replay value. If a deck of cards is all you need to play a game, we want to make that deck special.

Why do we love what we do?

Games are fun! And we think that fun can be contagious.

Old Favorites with Flair

Classic Games Given New Life

Games from Across the Globe

Looking for even more? We’ve probably got it! We’re always adding new and exciting games and experiences to our growing catalog.

Whether its board games, card games, dice games, even favorite casino games, gaming is our passion and we’re always looking to share with you our next big new thing. So keep your peepers peeled!

SHOOT THE POOP! Get wild with Shoot the Poop, a hilarious game for the whole family and makes perfect white elephant gifts for adults
NO PLUMBING REQUIRED: Includes a talking Tank the Toilet who’s flush with funny jokes, 12 plastic poop toys, and 2 launchers
POWER POOPER: This wild family game requires 2 AAA batteries to help Tank make crazy flushing sounds
THE FAMILY THAT POOPS TOGETHER: Enjoy some family toilet humor! Shoot the Poop is a great for 2 players kids games ages 4-8, 8-12+
HANDFUL OF POOP: Get launching with a fast-paced family dexterity game. Don’t get caught with your hands full of poo! Be the first to shoot your shot, and don’t forget to flush

Have a Poopy Day

Hi folks, meet Tank! He’s the talking toilet who loves to play. It’s up to you and one other player to get your fun flingers and form a doo-doo duo! Be the first player to launch all six of your poopy projectiles into Tank’s mouth. Powered by two AAA batteries, Tank will cheer you on as you take aim, ready, and fire away! This family dexterity game helps children develop fine motor skills, and it’s finished in a flash. Sink your last floater and win the game! Don’t forget to flush! When you pull Tank’s lever, he’ll always have something to say.

Read more

Why You’ll Love It

Shoot the Poop is a fast-playing game of reflex and humor. Play with 1 child or friend for some fun and a little bit of toilet humor. Age 5+, 2 players. Great for Christmas and White Elephant gifts and Birthday Presents from that crazy uncle.

Read more



Don’t Be a Donkey!
Cat-Tasrophe!
Irr-Elephant!
Honeycomb Hacov!
Looking for more family-friendly games from Brybelly? HEE-HAW! No pins, tails, or blindfolds required for this refreshing donkey game! Me-WOW! Save the kitty cat from the top of the tree in this classic and challenging kids dexterity game! More than an Earful! Place the platform, put the elephant in the right place, and try to keep it balanced! Sticky Situation! Use your paws to poke out pieces of honeycombs, snatching up delicious gobs of honey to munch for lunch!

4.5
Price: $27.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:42:50 UTC – Details)

【No-slip Bottom Puppy Pads】Non-slip bottom. Dog pee pad special bottom PVC epoxy resin keep the dog pads stable,slip-resistant backing will help keep your floors dry while staying in place.
【Reusable &Machine Washable】This is a reusable training pads for dogs, made with washable fabric reusable even after many times of washing. Durable washable pads, no shrinking even washing many times. It is easy to clean it, you can use warm water to wash it and dry
【Save Money & Eco-Friendly】Washable and reusable 120 of times,a must for any kind of puppies and kittens.an excellent economic and environmental choice saving money. These dog pee pads can protect the environment, beats buying endless bags of wee wee pads
【Multiply Functions】Our puppy training pads for dogs playpen, crate, bed cat litter box,ultimate protection for floor,carpet ,bed,furniture,sofa, car seat and car trunk, what’s more, Soft and durable surface materials polyester makes ultra waterproof also be used as feed pads underneath the water bowl for indoor and outdoor

Note:

Please buy according to your pet’s body type Cleaning: Machine washable Please do not use bleach or softener

Good quality

Great material of 4 layers prevent urine outflow and speed up floor

Super Absorption, Super Leakproof

Our Siwa Mary pee pads have super absorption high density middle layer, there will be no smell when using it, and no urine will be exposed. It can keep the floor clean at home all night, and the puppy can rest comfortably

Product Description

GAGURL reusable pet pads made of 4 Layers material with silicone non-slip bottom, has strong absorption to liquid, could well to against the heaviest smell. It could well protect your pets from slide or pad movement. Ideal for training, playpen, cat litter box, crate, ultimate protection for floor, carpet, bed, furniture, sofa, car seat. Our durable pet pad can be reused while saving money.We at GAGURL spend countless hours in developing, sourcing, and testing our products. Our primary concerns are that everything we make is safe for pets and their owners, a quality item, and has great value.

4- LAYER DESIGN

1 layer:100% polyester knitting surfac.

2 layer: Thickened super absorbent cotton.

3 layer: Breathable waterproof PUL inner layer; 100% polyester knitting fabric.

4 layer: Non-Slip silica gel bottom.

EFFICIENT ABSORPTION

The washable reusable pee pads are super absorption and non-leak, better to keep your pet and house clean. Ensure your indoor and outdoor furniture is protected against doggie wee accidents, floor water spills, and damage to your precious items.

LASTEST DESIGN

Our washable pee pads have cute patterns. Dogs and dog parents alike will love these designs.And 4 hole help you stick our pee pad on any flat surface so your dog never misses its mark.

COST-EFFICIENT: Our reusable pee pads for dogs ensure that fluids are absorbed and held for laundering without leaking. Washable and reusable puppy pads save you money and are good for our planet, our reusable puppy pee pads are good for 100+ washing cycles. Our pet pads are more cost-effective, of higher quality, and have a lower environmental impact than disposable pads that you constantly have to rebuy.
Durable & Comfortable: Our training pads are made of breathable waterproof PUL and a high-density inner layer which let the absorbency great and does not leak. 4 layers structure durable & comfortable, the first layer is a soft quilted fabric layer, the second layer is the absorbent layer, which can absorb 1000-1500ml of liquid, the third layer is the leak-proof layer, and the bottom layer is the anti-slip layer. Perfect for cars, sofas, beds, furniture, crates, and pet gate.
MULTI-USE: This reusable dog pad can be used for dog playpens, kennels, under food and water bowls, and cat litter boxes. It is helpful to protect our floors, sofas, and furniture away from damaged. Also can be used for car and RV travel, protecting car seats and car trunks. Our pads for dogs are perfect for pups of all ages. Use the pet pads to train puppies, and help senior or sick dogs use the bathroom in the right place.
What You Will Get: One package comes with 2 pack of reusable dog pee pads and 4 suction cup hook. 2 pack are really convenient for the busy pet owner, when the first get dirty, there is another one that can be changed, and that’s very convenient, your pets do not need to wait for the dirty one to wash and dry, and 2 pack keeps your house clean and your pet comfortable. We offer a 1-year guarantee, any problem, please feel free to contact us.
Reusable Puppy Pads: The washable pee pads for dogs are gray and have cute patterns on them, the reusable pee pads for dogs which is soft and comfortable could also provide funny for the puppy in travel. These waterproof reusable pee pads for dogs are a stylish choice! There are multi sizes to choose from, please choose a suitable size before placing an order. If you have any questions about the washable dog pee pads, please feel free to contact us.
